articles.title: Niger: US announces partial evacuation of embassy - BBC
articles.description: Hundreds of foreign nationals have already been evacuated from the country since a coup last week.
articles.content:
The United States has ordered the partial evacuation of its embassy in Niger following last week's coup.
Hundreds of foreign nationals have already been evacuated from the country, and on Sunday the… [+4454 chars]

articles.title: Brilliant Perseid meteor shower will see up to 100 shooting stars streak through the night sky next... - Daily Mail
articles.description: NASA expert says 'this year is going to be great' for viewing Perseid fireballs. In mid-August, hundreds of Perseid meteors will blaze into Earth's atmosphere at 37 miles per second each
articles.content:
NASA calls it the 'fireball champion' of annual meteor showers, and it's scheduled to happen under near-perfect conditions next week.
